CommandDefinition.Name: enableserviceprofiling
CommandDefinition.Description: Enables service profiling for the specified entity, if no entity is specified all available entities will be profiled

Argument.Name: application
Argument.Description: The name of the application containing the specified entity (all versions of this application will be measured in one aggregation)

Argument.Name: workspace
Argument.Description: The name of the workspace containing the specified entity
